amendment.description: To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund relating to protecting Medicare and Medicaid.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1144 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 89 - 9. Record Vote Number: 220.

action.text: Amendment SA 1144 proposed by Senator Enzi for Senator Hatch to Amendment SA 1116. (consideration: CR S6518-6520, S6521-6522; text: CR S6518) To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund relating to protecting Medicare and Medicaid.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1144 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 89 - 9. Record Vote Number: 220.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1144 proposed by Senator Enzi for Senator Hatch to Amendment SA 1116.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 1144 agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 89 - 9. Record Vote Number: 220.
